Articles.Content: It sort of works, most of the time...
I'm not sure I get what this is spupposed to do.
Ladders are ancient technology. elevators are the future. Our engineers couldn't grasp counter-weight technology, so we said screw it put some rockets on it.
Oh! I see now But how high does that go?

I tried to make it taller,but it just falls apart no matter how many struts I use. The rails get stuck sometimes and sometimes they don't. The wheels were pretty much useless, they didn't help stabilize it at all really like I was hoping.
If you could fit something orbit-capable in there, it would look like a space LAUNCH elevator!
Have you tried attaching it to a launch clamp?
